Background: QFrame{background-color: qradialgradient(spread:pad, cx:{1}, cy:{2}, radius:{0}, fx:0.5, fy:0.5, stop:0.349304 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), stop:0.477589 rgba(76, 254, 255, 205), stop:0.520866 rgba(76, 242, 255, 205), stop:0.700155 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0));}
ToolBar: QFrame{background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-bottom:2px solid qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:{1}, y1:0, x2:{2}, y2:0, stop:0.112 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), stop:0.466049 rgba(0, 251, 255, 155), stop:0.604956 rgba(0, 251, 255, 155), stop:0.874 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0));}
Edit: QLineEdit{color: rgb(255, 255, 255);font: 12pt "Microsoft YaHei"; border-bottom:2px solid qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:{1}, y1:0, x2:{2}, y2:0, stop:0.112 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), stop:0.466049 rgba(0, 251, 255, 155), stop:0.604956 rgba(0, 251, 255, 155), stop:0.874 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)); border-radius:0px; border-top:2px solid qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:{1}, y1:0, x2:{2}, y2:0, stop:0.112 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), stop:0.466049 rgba(0, 251, 255, 155), stop:0.604956 rgba(0, 251, 255, 155), stop:0.874 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0));}
NavBar: QFrame{border-radius:20px; background-color: qconicalgradient(cx:0.5, cy:0.5, angle:{0}, stop:0.03 rgba(255, 255, 255, 205), stop:0.118333 rgba(30, 25, 8, 0));}
